mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT rn.user_id nurseId, u.`name` nurseName, u.sex nurseSex, IFNULL(n.hospital, '') nurseHospital, ( SELECT url FROM nurse_images ni WHERE ni.source_id = u.id AND ni.type = 1 ) url, CASE WHEN n.work_years IS NOT NULL THEN ( ( YEAR (now()) - YEAR (n.work_years) - 1 ) + ( date_format(n.work_years, '%m%d') <= date_format(NOW(), '%m%d') ) ) ELSE '' END AS workYear, (rn.base_server_number+rn.real_server_numer) serviceNumber, d.lat, d.lon, d.city, d.distance, t.* FROM nurse_rank rn LEFT JOIN `user` u ON rn.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN nurse n ON u.id = n.creator_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ua.creator_id, ua.lat, ua.lon, ua.city, MIN( ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{lat} * PI() / 180 - ua.lat * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS( #{lat} * PI() / 180 ) * COS(ua.lat * PI() / 180) * POW( SIN( ( #{lon} * PI() / 180 - ua.lon * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ), 2 ) ) distance FROM user_address ua WHERE ua.`status` =0 GROUP BY ua.creator_id ) d ON d.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pn.creator_id, pp.price_id, pn.price_part_id, pn.price, p.service_number, p.service_time, p.unit, p.title FROM price_nurse pn LEFT JOIN price_part pp ON pn.price_part_id = pp.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON pn.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN price p ON pp.price_id = p.id WHERE pn. STATUS = 0 AND pn.goods_id = #{goodsId} ) t ON t.creator_id = rn.user_id LEFT JOIN worktime w ON w.userId = rn.user_id WHERE w.calendar =#{calendar} AND rn.status=1 AND w.${h}=0 AND t.price_id = #{priceId} AND d.city LIKE CONCAT(#{city}, '%') ORDER BY serviceNumber DESC
